member.name: INameSpaceTreeControlCustomDraw.ItemPostPaint
member.summary: Called after an item in the namespace tree control is drawn.
member.param: A handle to the control's device context. Use this HDC to perform any GDI functions.
A pointer to the structure that describes the bounding rectangle of the area being drawn.
A pointer to the struct that determines the details of the drawing.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INameSpaceTreeControlCustomDraw.ItemPrePaint
member.summary: Called before an item in the namespace tree control is drawn.
member.param: A handle to the control's device context. Use this HDC to perform any GDI functions.
A pointer to the structure that describes the bounding rectangle of the area being drawn.
A pointer to the structure that determines the details of the drawing.

On entry, a pointer to a COLORREF structure that declares the default color of the text. When this method returns, contains a pointer to a COLORREF structure that declares the color that should be used in its place, if any. This allows the client to provide their own color if they do not want to use the default.

On entry, a pointer to a COLORREF structure that declares the default color of the background. When this method returns, contains a pointer to a COLORREF structure that declares the color that should be used in its place, if any. This allows the client to provide their own color if they do not want to use the default.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to an LRESULT, which points to one or more of the values from the CDRF Constants enumeration.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INameSpaceTreeControlCustomDraw.PostPaint
member.summary: Called after the namespace tree control is drawn.
member.param: A handle to the control's device context. Use this HDC to perform any GDI functions.
A pointer to the structure that describes the bounding rectangle of the area being drawn.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INameSpaceTreeControlCustomDraw.PrePaint
member.summary: Called before the namespace tree control is drawn.
member.param: A handle to the control's device context. Use this HDC to perform any GDI functions.
A pointer to the structure that describes the bounding rectangle of the area being drawn.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to an LRESULT, which contains one or more of the values from the CDRF Constants enumeration.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: INameSpaceTreeControlCustomDraw
member.summary: Exposes methods that enable the user to draw a custom namespace tree control and its items.
